subject: Use this command to save and name the active document.
body:
I was looking to do something very similar to this. 
My kingdom for a horse.
I asked, and I warned you, and you said he had not. 
I fiddled with it all afternoon, to pass the time, though I knew I had her right.
I assume that no news comes from the explorers and 
that the Bokes prolong their pathetic vigils. The first jelly-fish moved back 
and the second immediately rolled up into a ball and fell on to the bottom of 
the tank.
He smashed his chain, he broke open the panther's 
cage and took it along to get through to the Palace.
The third line here is allocating space on the 
stack for the "s" variable in our c code back up there.
The same thinking applies to time 
zones.
